name: Programming in Python
description: Learn Python, a powerful and versatile programming language, in this concise and practical course.

name: Introduction to ReactJs
description: Learn ReactJs, a popular JavaScript library for building user interfaces. This course covers the basics of components, hooks, and routing.

name: Advanced Machine Learning
description: Learn the theory and practice of cutting-edge machine learning techniques in this intensive course.

name: Cyber Security and Ethical Hacking
description: Learn how to protect networks and systems from cyberattacks and how to perform ethical hacking in this course.

name: Object Oriented Programming in C#
description: Principles and practices of object-oriented programming. You will learn how to design, implement, and test reusable components.

name: Advanced programming using NodeJs and NextJs
description: It is a long established fact that a reader will be distracted by the readable content of a page when looking at its layout.

name: Introduction to Microsoft ASP .NET
description: Learn to build fast and scalable web applications with NodeJs and NextJs, the most popular frameworks for backend and frontend development.

name: Computer Vision and Image Processing
description: Fundamentals of computer vision and image processing, such as image representation, filtering, segmentation, feature extraction, and recognition.

name: Get Started with Amazon Web Services (AWS)
description: Learn AWS basics and best practices in this introductory course. Gain hands-on experience with cloud computing and services.
